description.p: Get the difference in days between two dates.

prototypes.prototype: DaysBetweenDates as N (Date1 as D, Date2 as D)

description.p: Returns the difference in days between two dates.

discussion.p: The DaysBetweenDates function computes the difference in days between two dates.

example.caption: DaysBetweenDates() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 OrderDate, ShippedDate, DaysBetweenDates(OrderDate, ShippedDate) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =08/04/1994 12:00:00 00 am|08/16/1994 12:00:00 00 am|12
